page.title: 16DONYINGS RECREATION CENTRE
page.content: {DONYINGS RECREATION CENTRE}is situated in Redhill. It was opened in DECEMBER 1984. There are many different activities that you can do such as BADMINTON, TENNIS, SWIMMING, BOWLS, YOGA,TRAMPOLINE, AEROBICS, SAUNA, JACUZZI, ARCHERY, NETBALL, HOCKEY, CRICKET, SQUASH, TABLE-TENNIS and many more. There is also a bar and a restaurant plus many clubs that you can join. There is a special membership scheme, a family of four can join for Â£16 per year. they also cater for special events and functions eg. Wedding Receptions, Fashion Shows, Boxing Tournaments, Dog and Cat Shows, Concerts and much more. DONYINGS is very popular and has made this area more interesting. The centre is very reasonable and with so many activities to choose from there is no way you will ever get bored.
